name: Gravity Chess
description:
Gravity Chess is a puzzle game that uses the movement rules of chess, but each piece is effected by gravity. 

The goal is either to take the enemy King, or to remove all enemy pieces from the board. Maneuver your pieces, but be careful, as your foe will take your pieces if they ever have the ability to. 

  • Claim victory in over 25 levels of progressive difficulty. 
  • Utilize the movement abilities of chess pieces, but beware as your piece will fall down to the ground once its done moving. 
  • Enemy pieces will move only when they can take your pieces, and if they can, they will. 
  • Every piece you have is a valid tool, or a valid sacrifice. 

We hope you enjoy!
